jobDescription: Requisition Number 18-0059 Post Date 4/19/2018 Sub Title Data Scientist, Transportation Finance City Arlington State VA Description Sabel Systems requires a Transportation Finance (Second Destination Transportation [SDT]) Programs and Initiatives Lead to provide analytical and technical expertise in the area of transportation billing, metrics, and data analysis to a headquarters-level  Department of Defense agency. The position requires a strong knowledge of the Transportation Of Things (ToT) program, standardized Defense Transportation System (DTS) Over-Ocean Transportation (OOT) billing via both USTRANSCOM Transportation Working Capital  Fund (TWCF), commercial movements, as well as knowledge of DoD and Marine Corps logistics policies. The successful candidate possesses knowledge of Marine Corps Transportation Finance Policy related to the Defense Transportation System, Third Party Payment  System (billing platform for commercial transportation service providers), Marine Corps Air Clearance Authority, and Transportation Financial Improvement and Audit Readiness. A highly qualified candidate has the ability to provide research and development,  data analysis, transportation billing and finance Subject Matter Expertise (SME), technical evaluations of finance systems, and the ability to conduct in-depth data mining, extrapolation and synthesis. Desired skills include excellent written and verbal communication,  problem solving, analytical thinking, inter-service coordination, and time management. The candidate will oversee and manage related websites and SharePoint sites. He/she will be required to participate in the planning, management, and reporting of a high-visibility  Service-level Financial Independent Audit Readiness (FIAR) compliance project. The candidate will assist through drafting recommended policy guidance, the preparation of memorandums, letters, papers, briefings, and other documents regarding transportation  budget related issues. The position will be located in the Washington D.C. metro area with some travel required.
